sessions.title: Automating Azure Public DNS Zone Management with Bicep and Deployment Stacks
sessions.description:
In this session, we will explore how to efficiently manage Azure Public DNS zones using Infrastructure as Code (IaC) principles. By leveraging Azure Bicep and Deployment Stacks, we’ll demonstrate how to automate the addition and removal of DNS records, ensuring a streamlined and error-free process. Attendees will gain insights into the benefits of using Bicep for declarative resource management and how Deployment Stacks can simplify complex deployments.

Whether you’re new to IaC or looking to enhance your existing Azure management practices, this session will provide practical knowledge and hands-on examples to elevate your DNS management strategy.

sessions.title: You’ve got the Power (Platform)! Controlling developers in Azure DevOps
sessions.description:
Developers have it all figured out with their code flows, everything is quickly pushed to production and it’s up to the processes to make sure nothing breaks down. But does this always work?

During this talk I will show you how to create extra controls on Pull Requests in Azure DevOps, which need to be passed before a piece of code is accepted. This is achieved by connecting to the Power Platform with Logic Apps and Power Apps. To make sure this process stays very user friendly, Power Apps are used to create a front-end to manage these extra steps.

Do you want to make sure your developers follow your processes without giving them extra work or more tools to learn? I bet you do! So join this talk and learn how to do this.
